sentences.sContent: Because be loved, proud Lin Lan cannot bear the grievance after be being misunderstood, cursory under put forward to part company.
sentences.sContent_eng: Because be loved, proud Lin Lan cannot bear the grievance after be being misunderstood, cursory under put forward to part company.
sentences.sCn: 因为被爱，骄傲的林岚不能忍受被误解后的委屈，草率之下提出分手。

remMethod.val: curs (跑) + ory → 跑过去 → 草率的

words.tran: 简略的；简要的；草率的；简单粗暴的

trans.tranOther: done very quickly without much attention to details
